page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT-HARMSTON & COLEBY
page.content: {FARMING:}With mechanisation, the 10 farmers and their families work their 10-500+ hectare farms (25-1250+ acres) with little assistance. 8 farmworkers only live locally and one smallholder. {HARMSTON HALL HOSPITAL}employs 400+ people. 35 only live locally, several being part-time women workers. {BUSINESSES,etc-Harmston:}2 builders, joiner, driving instructor, insurance broker, an electrical, a diesel and a civil engineer, all home-based. A small Nursing Home. Also the vicar, postmistress and publican. { {Coleby:}Joiner, building company, school, postmistress, 2 publicans, 1 restaurant employing 5 villagers, small Nursing Home. {UNEMPLOYED:}5 long term. Increasing number of women work part-time. Some retired are local people who have worked the land and stayed on.
